content.rendered:
WHAT WE’RE OFFERING

We Are Hiring
New Vacancies Available

Account Manager

ROLE PURPOSE • facilitate growth in the contribution to Revenue and Gross Profit of Mariner Loan Group by chiefly developing new business and then managing customer engagements at all levels within the customer business.

Apply Now

Delivery Lead: Loan Management System

We're on the lookout for energetic, self-motivated individuals who share our passion for service in the finance industry.

Apply Now

Loan Account Sales Rep - Matric Required To Apply

Responsible for serving customers through assessing customers needs, recommending appropriate products and/or services, performing entry-level customer services, and ensuring customers satisfaction through thorough and timely completion of services.

Apply Now

Corporate Credit Manager

Drafting and issuing of professional due diligence reports; Assessing credit applications for new and existing clients across a large spectrum of international and local clients; Post lending management Monitoring progress of lending developments, reporting on bilateral, syndication and other credit related business; Actively engage with and present reports to Credit Review Committee and Head Office as required

Apply Now

Business Funding Simplified.

Small business loans for daily expenses

Improve your cash flow in under 24 hours. Access between R20,000 and R5 000,000 in business finance with a Mariner Loans facility.
